survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Plant-Based Restaurant Menu Options Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on plant-based menu options at restaurants to understand satisfaction levels and preferences.

questions.question_text: How often do you choose plant-based menu options when dining out?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you choose plant-based menu options when dining out?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of plant-based menu options? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses and include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkboxes (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of plant-based menu options? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of plant-based options available at restaurants?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of plant-based options available at restaurants?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based menu options at restaurants?
questions.client_notes: Allow for open-ended responses to gather detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based menu options at restaurants?

questions.question_text: Would you be more likely to dine at a restaurant that prominently features plant-based options?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for straightforward responses.

script.question_text: Would you be more likely to dine at a restaurant that prominently features plant-based options?
